function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging individual transportation over public transport","Impact":"Potential for increased individual contact and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote usage of public transport through infrastructure improvements and health safety measures","Technologies":"Smart transportation systems, contactless payment, air quality sensors in public transport","People":"General public, commuters, passengers","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities, urban planners, architects"},{"Description":"Poor ventilation and air quality in interior spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, use HEPA filters, maintain indoor humidity above 40%","Technologies":"HVAC systems, HEPA filters, humidity sensors","People":"Building occupants, residents, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Middle density and intermediate housing in residential areas","Impact":"Higher population density leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Implement zoning regulations for safe population density, promote mixed land use and green spaces","Technologies":"Urban design planning, zoning regulations, green infrastructure","People":"Residents, neighbors, community members","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, architects"}]}
